text:
Impossible to invoke "removeRole" or other MBean methods and "setAttribute" by
MBeanServer cause of the same bug in ManagedBean.java at both lines 545
(getSetter method) and 604 (getInvoke method):
        object = this;
Must be replace by:
        object = bean;

Fortunately getGetter method is correct.
creator: kasius@ifrance.com
markt@apache.org
text: This has been fixed in svn and proposed for inclusion in 6.0.x

creator: markt@apache.org
text: This has been fixed in 6.0.x and will be included in 6.0.16 onwards.
